elements.label: Inspector of Police [Suspended]
elements.description: My absence has been noted. I've been suspended. [Plead your case soon, or lose your position forever.]

elements.label: Inspector of Police [Disgraced]
elements.description: I've lost my position. I'm unlikely to regain it. I must find my own way in the civilian world.

elements.label: Sealed Bureau File
elements.description: A file on the enigmatic #PREVIOUSCHARACTERNAME#. I sealed it myself. I am all too familiar with its contents. If I were to revisit them, the dreams might begin again.

elements.label: Tentative Evidence
elements.description: I have some evidence of my quarry's activities.

elements.label: Damning Evidence
elements.description: I have compelling evidence of my quarry's activities.

elements.label: Burning Bureau File
elements.description: It's almost gone! I could pluck it from the flames -

elements.label: Troubling Bureau File
elements.description: The evidence includes the kind of details that might make one lick one's lips, if one were interested in such things. I should not read it. The dreams might begin again.
